work.name: Simbrella
work.summary: Fintech company that developes financial services for Financial Institutions, Mobile Wallets and MNOs to offer loans to massive segments of untapped customers. We provide digital and instant financial services and reduce cost of risk applying AI-based models to efficiently assess customersâ€™ creditworthiness.
highlights: Main contributor to development of internal End-to-End testing framework that reduced amount of deployment incidents and bugs by 80% saving over 40 thousands of dollars per quarter.
Reduced the testing framework execution time by 60% significantly increasing development speed for other teams.
Migrated several intenal services to microservices architecture (3000+ lines of code).
Changing/Adding functionalities in the core products.

highlights: Modelling, testing and deployment of Machine Learning algorithms. Involved projects : Handwritten Text, Recognition, Spelling Correction Tool, Named Entity Recognition.

work.name: Kapital Bank OJSC
work.summary: Serves more than 5 million individuals and more than 22,000 legal entities.
highlights: Identified and fixed over 300 software bugs and flaws for solutions written in Java and Node.js.
Configured dependency vulnerability scanner across most of the company products that prevented releasing several vulnerable products.
Regular penetration testing of external web services.
